type.name: org.gradle.api.tasks.compile.DependOptions
type.description:
Options for the Ant Depend task. Only take effect if CompileOptions.useAnt and CompileOptions.useDepend are true.

The Ant Depend task will delete out-of-date and dependent class files before compiling so that only those files will be recompiled. This is not fool-proof but may result in faster compilation. See the Ant Reference for more information.

The srcDir, destDir, and cache properties of the Ant task are set automatically. The latter is replaced by a useCache option to enable/disable caching of dependency information.

method.name: getClasspath
method.description: Returns the compile classpath for which dependencies should also be checked. Defaults to the empty string.

method.name: isClosure
method.description: Tells whether to delete the transitive closure of outdated files or only their direct dependencies. Defaults to false.

method.name: isDump
method.description: Tells whether to log dependency information. Defaults to false.

method.name: isUseCache
method.description: Tells whether to cache dependency information. Defaults to true.

method.name: isWarnOnRmiStubs
method.description: Tells whether to warn on RMI stubs without source. Defaults to true.

method.name: setClasspath
method.description: Sets the compile classpath for which dependencies should also be checked. Defaults to the empty string.

method.name: setClosure
method.description: Sets whether to delete the transitive closure of outdated files or only their direct dependencies. Defaults to false.

method.name: setDump
method.description: Sets whether to log dependency information. Defaults to false.

method.name: setUseCache
method.description: Sets whether to cache dependency information. Defaults to true.

method.name: setWarnOnRmiStubs
method.description: Sets whether to warn on RMI stubs without source. Defaults to true.

property.name: classpath
property.description: Returns the compile classpath for which dependencies should also be checked. Defaults to the empty string.

property.name: closure
property.description: Tells whether to delete the transitive closure of outdated files or only their direct dependencies. Defaults to false.

property.name: dump
property.description: Tells whether to log dependency information. Defaults to false.

property.name: useCache
property.description: Tells whether to cache dependency information. Defaults to true.

property.name: warnOnRmiStubs
property.description: Tells whether to warn on RMI stubs without source. Defaults to true.
